de.iss.mv2.client.data

Class MailBoxSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.data.Exportable
      • de.iss.mv2.data.PropertiesExportable
        • de.iss.mv2.client.data.MailBoxSettings

  • public class MailBoxSettings
extends PropertiesExportable
    Stores the settings for a mail box.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

        The clients private key.
